Name: hardwood forestry, eucalyptus ssp., planted forest management | cleft timber, measured as dry mass | EN15804GD, U
Category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/02:Forestry and logging/021:Silviculture and other forestry activities/0210:Silviculture and other forestry activities
Description: Cultivation of wood to generate energy like charcoal inside steel industries. Big scale of plantations with high level of mechanization. Machines used in the harvesting step are: feller bunch to fell trees, skidder to extract the wood from the field to the forest boarder, grapple saw to process logs and loader grapple to load the transportation vehicle.
